channel.title: Autofocus on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Autofocus on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: autofocus - yet another productivity algorithm
item.description: Mark Forster has a new productivity system which he calls Autofocus.  There's the obligatory blog, video, twitter account, glowing Lifehacker review etc etc.  If you care, you'll look them up. Like many systems, this one relies on making one list and then working your way through it.  The twist on this system vs. some others is that for the most part there is very little attempt to produce metadata about the parts of your list that you're working on.
